```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
using LocalCoverage
coverage = generate_coverage("Landfire"; run_test=true)
html_coverage(coverage; dir=joinpath(@__DIR__, "_site", "coverage"), open=false)
rm(joinpath(dirname(@__DIR__), "coverage"); recursive=true, force=true)
```

<iframe id="coverage-iframe" src="coverage/index.html" width="100%" style="border:none; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="no"></iframe>

<script>
(function() {
    var iframe = document.getElementById('coverage-iframe');
    function resize() {
        try {
            iframe.style.height = iframe.contentDocument.documentElement.scrollHeight + 'px';
        } catch(e) {}
    }
    iframe.addEventListener('load', resize);
    window.addEventListener('resize', resize);
})();
</script>
